name: Labs Test report
query:
SELECT 
    c.patient_name as "Patient Name:Data:250",
    c.patient_age as "Age:Data:200",
    pt.age_type as "Tyoe:Data:100",
    pt.sex  as "Sex:Data:100",
    p.lab_test_name AS "Test Name:Data:250",

    p.result_value  AS "Result:Data:200"

    
FROM 
    `tabLab Result` c
JOIN 
    `tabNormal Test Result` p ON c.name = p.parent
JOIN 
    `tabPatient` pt ON c.patient = pt.name  -- Assuming `patient_name` links to `tabPatient`
    
WHERE 
    
   c.date BETWEEN %(Start_date)s AND %(End_date)s 
    AND c.docstatus = 1
